ModMetaData.name: Undergrounders: Ghostwort and Glowstool
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
This mod adds a new decorative plant, ghostwort. While it grows quickly and is quite beautiful, it does not live long and requires complete darkness.
Also allows for domestic glowstool to be planted, providing a dim, gentle light.
